amendment.description: Amendment made technical and clarifying changes to the text of the amendment considered as adopted pursuant to the provisions of the rule.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to make technical and clarifying changes to the text of the amendment considered as adopted pursuant to the provisions of the rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sutton amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: On ordering the previous question on the amendment (A001) and on the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 196 (Roll no. 186).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Sutton.
